Votes and Rewards
In order to vote for our server use this command: .getreward What Reward I can get from vote?

- Vote Box - 1 Hour Expiration Period


Double-Click the Vote Box and you earn 2 Vote Coin(s) and a random reward of: 1x Vote Coin(s), 1x EAS, 1x EWS, 1x BEAS, 1x BEWS, 5x CM, 1x Donator Coin.

Notice! Vote Box can be Tradeable.
